title: Noir
description: To take part in this gambling crime race, players will need deduction, logical thinking skills, excellent intuition, strong memory and the ability to read opponents as an open book.

title: Barbaria
description: In the days of ancient heroes, warriors and kings, the world was inhabited by monsters, witches and bloodthirsty tyrants. There were a lot of them, so that fearless barbarians would be easier to enter into legends. It's time for you to follow in the footsteps of the heroes!

title: Sickle
description: Players will have to take control of one of the factions in the alternative history of Europe in the 20s of the last century and bring it to wealth and prosperity to the envy of its neighbors! A unique hero, huge mechanisms and ... peasants with sickles will become a reliable support on the path to conquest.

title: Machi Koro
description: In the game `Machi Koro` you have to build a city of dreams, investing in it all your talent and inspiration. Acquire various enterprises: each of them will supplement your city in its own way, as well as replenish the treasury. Most importantly, do not forget to build attractions, because they will attract tourists to the city and lead to victory.

title: Classic Citadels
description: In the Citadels, players compete for the right to be called the chief builder of the kingdom. To do this, you need to impress the monarch with outstanding skills and enlist the support of the nobles and the rich. Each round, you secretly choose a character who will help you. Today it is a bishop collecting church tithes, and tomorrow an assassin who will eliminate other people's minions.

title: Epic battles of battle magicians. Outrage at the Castle of the Slaughterhouse.
description: Cast battle spells and feed the sinister beasts, gnawing chains in the dungeons of the castle of Sprutoboyne. The frantic Serpent Kurinich, the indestructible Cubodemon and the agile Hamadrantul will turn your enemies into a pool of hairy ectoplasm. And if you yourself glued fins for the company, boldly resurrect when no one is waiting, and instantly merge into grandiose atrocities!

title: Dead Season. Long night.
description: “Dead season. Long night” is a semi-cooperative game in which each participant controls a separate group of people (everyone starts the game with two characters) as part of a small colony of survivors, day after day fighting the deadly virus and an endless stream of the dead.

title: Dungeon Kingdom of the Ice Witch.
description: Since time immemorial, the witch Kolizar has been hiding in winter halls on the border of the kingdom of people. But now the witching winter has come, and hordes of ice demons inspire fear in the southern lands! Will the heroes dare to come to the monastery of Kolizar and stop her, until the whole world is wrapped in the frosty breath of death?

title: Gentleman's deal
description: In this game you will need to use all your knowledge about negotiations and diplomacy. We need to try to please everyone in the difficult world of bigwigs and businessmen in order to conclude the most profitable deal and become a winner.

title: Red 7
description: The rules are simple: collect the best combination of cards to lead at the end of the turn. But at any moment the rules may change - and the winning combination will be a losing one!

title: Fluxx Zombies
description: Everything changes when they come ... Shuffling gait, outstretched arms, lingering moan `Brains!` ... What to do ?! You can search in the pantry for a chainsaw. Or hammer the door. Or maybe train the walking dead to participate in the Major League? Think faster before the zombies get to you! Draw a card, play a card, shoot zombies that prevent you from winning ... But the rules have changed - now you just can not do without a couple of the living dead. In `Fluxx Zombies`, only players can decide whether or not to be a zombie apocalypse.
